revised_title: Entozoon folliculorum: Research on a Newly Discovered Parasitic Animalcule
tldr: Erasmus Wilson's research on the Entozoon folliculorum, a newly discovered parasitic animalcule in human skin, reveals its structure, development, and various stages. The author distinguishes two main varieties of the adult animal and provides a detailed description of their ova and developement. This study contributes to the understanding of the skin's microanatomy and the role of these parasites in human health.
